New Records: Lionel Messi became the fastest player in MLS history to reach 25 goal contributions, scoring a brace for Argentina in their Copa América tune-up against Guatemala.
Key Match Events: Messi scored an easy goal after a gift from Columbus Crew goalkeeper Nicholas Hagen in the 12th minute.
Messi scored his second goal of the match in the 77th minute after a sublime service by Ángel Di María.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match served as Argentina's final Copa América tune-up before their title defense against Canada on June 20.
